author: costin
msg: - do not recompile/jar/delete every time something changes
- no wars generated - avoid the extra overhead for beginning
- split shell/ in bin/ conf/ props/ to simplify build.xml
- the build goes to the build directory ( can be overriten using
The old tag is still there, in case something gets broken.

author: costin
msg: Small build-related fixes, less work for auto-build/test.
